AfterShow.Name: initItemClick
AfterShow.Source: const UC = this;		const elId = "ch-step" + UC.id;		const el = document.getElementById(elId);		el.addEventListener("itemClicked", function(e){			/*get the selected item*/			for (let i = 0; i < UC.StepItems.length; i++) {				const item = UC.StepItems[i];				if (item.text === e.detail["item-clicked"]){					UC.SelectedItem = item.text;					if (UC.ItemClick){						UC.ItemClick();					}					break;				}			}		});
